edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck.Obstacles

Class WheelObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck.Obstacles.Obstacle
      • edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck.Obstacles.SimpleObstacle
        • edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck.Obstacles.WheelObstacle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Level, Planet

    public class WheelObstacle
extends SimpleObstacle
    Circle-shaped model to support collisions. Unless otherwise specified, the center of mass is as the center.

      • scaleDraw

        public float scaleDraw
        MADE PUBLIC TO AVOID ISSUE, NEED TO MAKE PROTECTED

    • Constructor Detail

      • WheelObstacle

        public WheelObstacle(float radius)
        Creates a new circle at the origin. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale converts the physics units to pixels.
        Parameters:
        radius - The wheel radius

      • WheelObstacle

        public WheelObstacle(float x,
                     float y,
                     float radius)
        Creates a new circle object. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale converts the physics units to pixels.
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position of the circle center
        y - Initial y position of the circle center
        radius - The wheel radius
